name: Cat Color Picker
description:
This is version 0.1 of a cat pet simulator game (not a full game). I have no experience with shaders in Monogame or outside of Monogame. I wanted to see if I could allow a player to choose the color of a cat and this is a prototype of that. Any further development will be documented.  All sprites made and owned by me.

The games aim is to be small, cute, and engaging. REMINDER, this is not the game prototype, just the color picking mechanic prototype.

(How To Play)

WASD keys to move cat, Q & E scale the cat up or down, F key to change cats pose.

Move sliders by first clicking on its button (R,G,B) and then while its active use the arrow keys left or right.

Have a good one!
